title: EbGames $50 prepaid card
body:
Hey I Bought a $50 league of legends card yesterday, I live in Australia and I've always played on the N/A servers and my prepaid card won't work it continues to say that the region is incorrect how do I fix this issue?

Please and Thankyou
Sincerely, xXIIIOIISTERXx

replies.body: RP Cards are specific to the region they are purchased in, so it's likely the code was intended for the OCE region.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if our billing team can make an exception here.  We'll respond as soon as we can!

Thankyou but where do I go once I'm their I've gone through all of the support pages and etc.. but I don't know what a ticket is I haven't played for 12months but have played for years, so have experience if you could guide me through would be muchily appreciated, just don't know where exactily to go to talk to someone about this or to submit a claim/refund/riotpoints ^_^
Thankyou POROCLES
No worries!  I linked our support ticket submission in my first response, but if you have any issues you can also email us directly via support@riotgames.com.  We'll take care of ya!
hello i have a similar problem is this exception policy still work ?
Which request would I submit if I wanted the prepaid card looked at or what not?

The following category should be fine:

_I have a question about League of Legends/Riot Games._
